description: AI-powered code editor with cloud agents that can work on your repositories. Launch agents, monitor their status, and automate code-related tasks.

actions.name: add_followup_instruction
actions.description: Adds follow-up instructions to a running cloud agent

actions.name: delete_agent
actions.description: Delete a cloud agent. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

actions.name: find_agent_status
actions.description: Retrieve the current status and results of a cloud agent

actions.name: launch_agent
actions.description: Start a new cloud agent to work on your repository

triggers.name: agent_pull_request_created
triggers.description: Triggers when a background agent creates a pull request

triggers.name: agent_status_changed_webhook
triggers.description: Triggers when an agent status changes (ERROR or FINISHED). Configure this webhook URL when launching an agent.

triggers.name: agent_status_equals
triggers.description: Triggers when a Cursor agent has the specified status (e.g., "FINISHED", "FAILED")

triggers.name: new_agent_conversation_message
triggers.description: Triggers when a new message appears in a specific agent\

triggers.name: new_agent
triggers.description: Triggers when a new Cursor agent is created or when agent status changes
